title: Rapper YG boots fan from concert for refusing to yell 'F-- Donald Trump'
text:
The price for admission at a YG show has an unspoken caveat: a willingness to scream “F– Donald Trump.”

A young man who attended the rapper’s San Antonio concert Saturday was booted from the building for refusing to curse out President Trump on stage.

“I spotted you out in the crowd. I asked you if you f–ed with Donald Trump, you said you don’t know,” the rapper said before a crowd at the Mala Luna music festival, USA Today reported Sunday. “So, since you don’t know, I need you to make up your mind tonight.”

Footage of the event was also shared on Twitter by XXL magazine.

“I want you to state your name because I know your momma, your daddy, your grandmama, your grandfather is watching,” YG, whose real name is Keenon Daequan Ray Jackson, continued. “I want you to state your name and say, ‘F– Donald Trump.’”

The young man refused as was promptly escorted off stage.

“Get his ass outta here. Get him off stage. F– off outta here,” the rapper continued.

One of his collaborations is titled “FDT,” or “F– Donald Trump.”

Warning: Strong Language is included in the embedded tweet.

YG invites fan on stage to yell out “F**k Donald Trump,” kicks him off after he refuses pic.twitter.com/7z9r9gVXav — XXL Magazine (@XXL) October 27, 2019

description: The price for admission at a YG show has an unspoken caveat: a willingness to scream "F--- Donald Trump."
